file_content.text: You did it! By the time Fa'athra's guards figure out what's happened, we'll all be long gone.
I'll run ahead and report to Kraay. If you kill more of Fa'athra's guards, that'd be a big help.
Who are you? Not Fa'athra's people, I know that. Kraay sent you, didn't he?
How you planning to bust me out? I can't stroll around with this slave collar on.
If I step outside the secure zone, I'll be shocked unconscious--or worse.
Kraay gave me a gadget to deactivate the collar.
I have something to fix that.
Wouldn't be much of a rescue if I didn't have a workaround.
Just relax.
Pipe down. Your creepy Twi'lek pal sent me prepared, all right?
Keep your trap shut.
You can neutralize slave collars? Fantastic! Use it to free the others.
These poor people got caught in the wrong place at the wrong time. Fa'athra's working them to death.
They're strong enough to make a run for it. They just need their slave collars deactivated first.
You care about these other slaves that much?
Why help them?
We've been keeping each other alive in here. I won't just leave them.
Nah, it'd be a waste of time.
You're more than a match for Fa'athra's guards. You got in here, right?
I'm not being paid for that.
It's going to be like that, huh? I'm calling your bluff. I won't leave unless you free the others.
If the guards discover I escaped, they'll torture the others to death. Can't happen.
All you have to do is deactivate the other slave collars. My friends will make a break for it when the guards aren't looking.
I was given the option to kill you. I'm taking it.
Too much trouble. [Kill him]
You heartless piece of filth!
I'll help your friends escape.
Okay, everyone gets free.
Great! Once you've deactivated their collars, come back to free me.
I'm only doing this to cripple Fa'athra's factory.
I'm not doing this for you.
Whatever works.
Prison break seems like it'll be a good time.
I'll enjoy this.
I'm glad you're having a good time.
Don't expect any miracles.
I know you will.
Quit babbling.
Just making sure we all understand the plan.
I told you, I'm not leaving without my friends! Use the slave collar deactivator on them, too.
